name: Star Blaster (bperry14)
description:
Star Blaster - Made using Python 3.8 and Pygame 1.9.6

Installing Python:

https://www.python.org/

Installing PyGame:

https://www.pygame.org/wiki/GettingStarted

- Play an arcade-like space shooter!

- Fly through space using a customizable space ship and dodge and destroy the asteroids around you!

- Grab power-ups to help you survive!

- Get the highest score possible!
